targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by (container)
sum(container_memory_cache{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by (container)

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

((sum by (cluster, namespace) (num_pods_compliant{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}))/((sum by (cluster, namespace) (num_pods_compliant{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}))+(sum by (cluster, namespace) (num_pods_noncompliant{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}))))*100
